Package food.view.screen

Class AbstractScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • food.view.screen.AbstractScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FoodScreen, NutritionScreen, SearchScreen
    public abstract class AbstractScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements Screen
    The Template for all concrete Screen classes. Each Screen class overrides the setupNodes() method, which specifies what appears on the screen and where.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Controller controller
      The enveloping window's controller.

      The list of JavaFX nodes on the Screen.

                                                                                   java.lang.String columnAttribute)
        Creates a new column in a given table view.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the row in the table.
        S - The data type for the column value.
        Parameters:
        table - The table to modify.
        columnName - The name of the column.
        columnAttribute - The attribute name (based on T).
        Returns:
        The created column.
